title: Ballot Design and Analysis of Invalid Votes: Simulation-Based Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electoral systems and voting procedures
context.additional_context: Analysis of the impact of ballot design through voting simulations recreating real election scenarios in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of various ballot design formats on invalid vote rates.
Learners can propose improvements to voting processes by applying behavioral economics principles.
Learners can evaluate voting mechanisms and design error-reduction strategies in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
